description: Priroda (“nature”) is a multisensor research module (orbital complex) for Russia's orbital Mir station (“peace”) dedicated to the observation of the environment. Major partners/organizations involved: Roskosmos (Russian Space Agency), RAS (Russian Academy of Sciences), RSC (Rocket Space Corporation) Energia, S.. P. Korolev, Moscow region - the prime contractor and developer of the Mir Station and its modules; RNII KP (Russian Institute of Space Device Engineering), IRE-RAS (Institute of Radioengineering and Electronics), NPO Planeta, etc.
name: PRIRODA
